sections.heading: Recompiled.Section 11-15-2 - Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilation.— Laws 2005, ch. 22, § 4 recompiled former 11-15-1 NMSA 1978 as 12-10-14 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 2005.

sections.heading: Recompiled.
sections.text: Recompilation.— Laws 2005, ch. 22, § 4 recompiled former 11-15-2 NMSA 1978 as 12-10-15 NMSA 1978, effective July 1, 2005.
